chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (P : Z -> Set) (p : nat), (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> and_recZ p P -> and_recZ (S p) P

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
lt_absZ = fun x y : Z => ltZ (absZ x) (absZ y) : Z -> Z -> Prop
and_recZ = fun (p : nat) (P : Z -> Set) => forall n : nat, n <= p -> and_set_set_set (P (pos n)) (P (neg n)) : nat -> (Z -> Set) -> Set Arguments and_recZ _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
Zrec2 : forall P : Z -> Set, (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> and_recZ 0 P
Zrec1 : forall P : Z -> Set, (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> P OZ
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rect : forall P : Z -> Type, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_sind : forall P : Z -> SProp, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rec : forall P : Z -> Set, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_sind : forall P : nat -> SProp, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Fin.t_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : Fin.t (S ?n)) (P : Fin.t (S ?n) -> Type), P Fin.F1 -> (forall p0 : Fin.t ?n, P (Fin.FS p0)) -> P p where ?n : [ |- nat]
exists_between_ind : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> P l -> P (S l)) -> (forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> P (S l)) -> forall n : nat, exists_between Q k n -> P n
between_sind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> SProp), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
VectorDef.Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n) v)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [ |- Type]
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < S n -> A m)
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n)) (P : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), P (VectorDef.cons ?A h ?n t)) -> P v where ?A : [ |- Type] ?n : [ |- nat]
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) Arguments between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bet_emp _%function_scope _%nat_scope Arguments bet_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) Arguments VectorDef.Exists {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_hd {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_tl {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
VectorDef.case0 : forall P : VectorDef.t ?A 0 -> Type, P (VectorDef.nil ?A) -> forall v : VectorDef.t ?A 0, P v where ?A : [ |- Type]
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Nat.pair_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> A 1 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n) -> A (S (S n))) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
tech_lt_abs_OZ : forall x : Z, lt_absZ x (pos 0) -> x = OZ
minus_plus_simpl_l_reverse : forall n m p : nat, n - m = p + n - (p + m)
Nat.le_antisymm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m
